definition.script: pipeline { agent any; stages { stage("Build Docker Image") {steps { dir('/nginx-setup') { sh 'docker build -t toto-nginx .'; }}}; stage("Deploy") {steps { sh 'docker stop toto-nginx || true' ; sh 'docker rm toto-nginx || true' ; sh 'docker run -d -p 80:80 --network totonet --name toto-nginx toto-nginx'; }};}}
